archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Plafond Monitoring
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Trend Monitoring (weekly ?)
Peak Analysis​
1. Credit analyzes the peaks of plafond usages (usually on Tuesdays)​ 2. For those retailers who are close to exhaustion, Credit proposes to CPDM and adjustment​ 2. CPDM uses Trade to inform the retailes and at the same time sends IGT's proposal to the broker
